item.content:encoded:
You gain the trophy from looping with Mysterious Bloodline, not becoming Season 30. Since an alternate way of obtaining the Mysterious Bloodline was added via looping to Season 30 I imagine the bloodline is awarded on loop, but before the Friendly trophy check, allowing you to also get the trophy in the same loop.

Have you looped to Season 30 recently and are able to corroborate this?

item.title: Gaining trophy upon looping
item.content:encoded:
You gain this trophy upon becoming Season 30.

Just from reading the wiki, you might think that you would have to become season 30, get the bloodline, then loop again…but no, upon becoming season 30 you are awarded the trophy.
